title: Miami Ink television series logo script
content:
Looking for the typeface used (or close to it) in the Miami Ink Logo. Any and all help is appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723071349im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MiamiInk_6696.jpg)
author: BeauSim

comments.content:
There is some similarity in the letterforms of [Artemisia Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723071349/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/ef/artemisia/), by Jürgen Brinckmann, although they do not connect.

- Mike Yanega
It is hand lettering. Good luck. Nothing has flamey dots like this.

Actually, PresenceTypo's [Madisonian](http://web.archive.org/web/20140723071349/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=3&displayfontid=PRE.119264.0.0&fontRendererText=Flamie+Carl+the+Killer) has flamey dots, but certainly not a match. I agree that it's hand lettered.
I really like Skin deep, gonna get that and use it instead. Thanks for the tip!
